buddy_profile.name: Claire Quillet
buddy_profile.title: CEO - TSB
buddy_profile.introduction: I am a Water, Sanitation & Hygiene (WASH) humanitarian and development professional who worked for more than 20 years in Indonesia for International NGOs and UNICEF. I founded my consultancy firm 7 years ago to support private sector to develop their strategy, engage stakeholders and implement in the field their sustainability projects/programs. I have a extensive network in Indonesia, from the local community/NGOs to several ministries. I am also GRI copywriter.

professional_background.specialization: Water, Sanitation & Hygiene (WASH) humanitarian and development

top_3_advice: Do not just look at the regulations.
Identify dedicated personnel in the company to tackle the sustainability matters.
Advocate for managers to change their mindset in regards to sustainability.
buddy_profile.how_to_help: Open Indonesian network, and support in search for Indonesian regulations.
buddy_profile.sustainability_motivation: I have been working in development program for 20 years, for NGO and the UN. I created my consultancy company to support the private sector on their development and sustainability journey.
organizational_responsibilities: Engaging with clients and relevant stakeholders
Engaging expert consultants for implementing field projects

challenges_and_solutions.major_challenge: Going beyond just what companies need to do as per regulations, and have a clear social impact in the field
challenges_and_solutions.solution: Develop strategy with very simple and achievable steps, as well as engaging the right and professional partner for field implementation

buddy_profile.proudest_achievement: That clients are coming back to us for more support, in a collaborative way.
